content: For the first half of the year, this implies a revenue range of $649 million to $669 million for our health care business, which reflects 9% to 12% constant currency growth. So - but if you look at the year-to-date, I think an important point I made in my prepared remarks is that for the first half of the year, our revenue range in the second quarter implies a first half revenue of $649 million to $669 million for our health care business, which reflects 9% to 12% revenue growth on a constant currency basis.
